name: Glazed Porcelain Tea Set: "Embracing Truth"
description: A simple, unadorned glaze porcelain tea set whose make and craft have been passed down through the years of Liyue's history.\nLegend has it that unadorned glazed porcelain of this kind symbolizes a pure and elegant character, and that this is one of the essences of "tea" itself. Indeed, the value of a tea set is often not to be judged by its price alone.
